name: RNIBTalkingBooks
0:
”Alexa, open RNIB Talking Books”
”Alexa, ask RNIB Talking Books”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: r. n. i. b. talking books
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Browse a wide selection of tens of thousands of unabridged audio books from RNIB library, read with human voice narration. RNIB Talking Books bring you titles from the latest best-sellers, through to the classics, and everything in-between.

RNIB has been making Talking Books since 1935, opening up the world of reading for blind and partially sighted people. RNIB has embraced innovation to bring more books to more readers in multiple formats and is now delighted to bring its library collection to your Alexa device.

With the number of new titles growing all the time, you’ll never have the chance to be bored. So, sit back, relax and listen to the original talking book service now brought straight to your living room, office or wherever you choose to listen to your books.

This is only available to blind and partially sighted people living in the UK. To join RNIB Reading Services, please visit https://readingservices.rnib.org.uk or call RNIB Helpline on 0303 123 9999 for further information.

When visiting the log in page you will need to enter your RNIB Reading Services log in details. In addition, you must tick a box allowing offline access to Reading Services. This will keep your account linked permanently without a need to relink again.
